JobFullDesc: Job Description: Would you like to work in a collaborative environment in a distributed team environment supporting engineering teams across our business portfolio? Then join our Raytheon team of engineers solving problems that make the world a safer place and help to secure our great nation! Come support those who provide us with all the freedoms we enjoy.Raytheon is seeking a talented System Engineer to support the Systems Engineering team within our Digital Technologies Engineering Solutions organization.  This role is responsible for the researching, piloting, & delivering Systems and Whole Life Engineering tools, automated solutions and best practices in support of the Raytheon SAS Engineering Solutions Systems Engineering (SE) team, which supports the requirements management, architecture, math & analysis, modeling & simulations, IV&V, and specialty engineering capabilities.The candidate must be an effective communicator with a successful track record of technical leadership.  The candidate should have an excellent working knowledge of Systems Engineering processes and applications, and have the ability to insert and integrate applications into programs.
